Entry.Name: Insecure Hostname Verifier
Entry.Description: This app allows self-defined HOSTNAME VERIFIER to accept all Common Names (CN). This implementations can lead to vulnerabilities which can be used to perform MiTM (Man-in-The-Middle) attacks on network traffic from the victim application.

Mitigation.Textual:
To strengthen security, any code that bypasses SSL certificate validation should be removed and app should relied to default implementations.
The solution may vary, depending on the app implementation.
You can find more information on this links [1] [2]
